Package StaffManagement

Interface StaffManagementRemove

All Known Implementing Classes:
hospitalStaffManagement
public interface StaffManagementRemove
The StaffManagementRemove interface defines the contract for removing staff records from the hospital management system. Implementing classes should provide the logic for removing a staff member based on their unique staff ID.

The primary method in this interface is removeStaff(String) which removes a staff member from the system using the provided staff ID.

Since:
2024-11-06
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tan Guang Wei

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    removeStaff(String staffID)
    Removes a staff member from the system.

  • Method Details

    • removeStaff

      boolean removeStaff(String staffID)
      Removes a staff member from the system.
      Parameters:
      staffID - The unique identifier for the staff member to be removed.
      Returns:
      true if the staff member was successfully removed, false if the removal failed (e.g., if the staff ID was not found).
